name: planted.burger
description: The ultimate comfort food with a golden, extra-crispy coating and juicy texture.
longDescription: Experience the ultimate comfort food with our planted.burger Crispy. Featuring a golden, extra-crispy coating and incredibly juicy, chicken-like texture inside, it delivers that satisfying crunch and flavor in every bite. Build your dream burger with all your favorite toppings.
ingredients: Water, pea protein (21%), wheat flour, breadcrumbs, rapeseed oil, pea fiber, natural flavoring, spices, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Pan-fry for 4-5 minutes on each side until golden and crispy. Also works great in the oven at 200°C for 15-18 minutes.

steps.title: Choose
steps.description: Pan for crispier. Oven at 200°C for easier.

steps.title: Cook
steps.description: Pan: 4-5 min per side. Oven: 15-18 min.

steps.title: Build
steps.description: Toast the bun. Stack it high. Crunch time.
